title: Your Most Hated Champion?
body: Ok, so I always noticed that everyone who plays League has a personal grudge against at least 1 champion. It feels like only they have a problem with the champ and everyone else is fine with them, for me that champ has always been Diana. I can't explain it, something about her ult reset if you hit her impossible to miss Q pisses me off, I always ban her if I can. So who is that champion to you guys, the one champ that you personally hate no matter what?

replies.body: Everytime I crush a yasuo in lane I hope that feel so bad to the point they never play that cancerous champion ever again.

{{champion:53}}  Is my most hated champion. I hate  going against this fucker, especially good ones. According to  champion.gg last week he had the SECOND HIGHEST WIN RATE, only next to Morgana who came in at first. (Oh yeah, people seeing how OP Morgana is now and are playing Morgana mid, and what's with all the Blitzcranks also opting to go mid?)

Anyhow, usually when there is a Blitz on my team, i  always win, or if he's on the other team, I can expect my bot lane to feed.   A good Blitzcrank don't give a flying fuck about your minion wave protecting you, he will just speed with W around and throw  a hook and get you. Once you're hooked, you're fucked pretty much.  So a hook, knock up, and ult=gg, but to have his adc hitting you? That's overkill.

I do gotta laugh about one thing tho... Is when it comes to team fighting or just Blitz hooking someone in general, it's funny cause  have you seen how literally everyone goes all in once he lands a hook? Especially in team fights. So it's 5v5, everyone trying to position for that moment to get the attack going and to intitiate. Whenever a Blitz pulls someone ironically the whole other team jumps in as well tho  it's safe to assume they just lost that member no matter what. Usually a Blitz team will spam all their skills on whoever he pulls, I guess that's one way of looking at it, but just a  thought I had, everyone always goes in when he does the pull, even if they don't have perfect position.

Anyhow, it's my most hated champion, and I consider him very fucking toxic. Surprise everyone! It's a supp.

EDIT ALSO...... Blitzcranks are getting smart! Watch out folks, now they pop their E, and just fucking run at you to knock you up lol, then they Q and hook. Pretty smart. I been seeing this happen lately. Either way, you're fucked with this guy.

{{champion:64}} 
Who needs skill when you can chose your fights?
Who needs skill when you have no risk at all going in?
Who needs skill when you can just press R for 200% AD, %HP, huge CC knockback? 
Who needs skill when you have 43258972324589743 dashes ON TOP OF 350 MOVESPEED?
Who needs to worry about getting nerfed when you are playing Riot's love child?
Who needs exciting montages with never before seen outplays when you can watch the same boring Insec 500000x over in slow motion?
Who needs a well paying job when you can just fork most of your money out to the govermnent?
Who needs a relationship when you can just sit at your computer all day?
Who needs - wait where was I going with this....?
Two. Lee Sin has two dashes. One of them requires an enemy unit to get hit by a skill shot.

You even gotta _hit a button_ to use it.

Like, Riot, do you expect me to do _everything_ around here for you?

{{champion:157}} 
Really fun to play, really bull shit to go against. He does need some nerfs.

> [{quoted}](name=SuchSwagSuchweed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Tj6eqz2N,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-28T00:19:51.892+0000)
>
> {{champion:157}} 
> Really fun to play, really bull shit to go against. He does need some nerfs.

He's already the squishiest melee in the game and can be easily bursted outside the laning phase. I'm not defending him, the bullshit he can do behind a skilled player is unreal.

>He's already the squishiest melee

{{champion:37}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:28}} say hi.
Melee, Sona and Veigar are ranged
Shhh, don't make him feel bad.

Like many here. {{champion:53}} 

I HATE Blitz!!!! People always try to defend him as "Noob bait", "One trick pony", well that one trick is absolutely game breaking! Massive displacement, about 4 seconds of chained CC, and prolly 50 to 70% of your health all in his only real combo. NO CHAMP can deny an ADC farm just by walking back and forth in lane like he does. His popularity in blind pick is a BIG factor in why squishier supports don't see much play; And his player base tends to be so freaking annoying! (His voice and laugh don't help...)

Lastly, Blitz remains THE ONLY champ that actually makes people worse at game fundamentals. I've met MANY ADC's who can't play their part without a hook champ to spoon feed them early kills; not to mention how his very presence affects team fights and tower sieges in mid to late game... why bother with creative play making and team co-ordination when you can just gather around the robot and wait for a free kill and 2 to 4 assists?

Needs a total rework, a nerf to his Q's displacement, or straight up deletion!

I would suggest removing his knock up on his E. Maybe give him a slow on his E, like a power punch that slows you. It wouldn't be as nearly as bad as that fucking knock up that lasts like  half a second. At least with a slow, you can still fight back.

I understand Thresh overall is a safer champion, and can help his teammates and doesn't have to land hooks, but for me, Blitz is always gonna be more toxic than Thresh and fucking annoying. I hate Blitz, and yeah I hate that damn robot laugh.

Especially hate Blitzcranks when they talk shit.

I had a previous thought on this.

I proposed that Blitz's E should have it's bonus damage scaled down, the knock up removed, and replaced with a knock away. (No stun, just a knock away)

This would make it a buff/nerf that would reduce the ridiculous strength of his all in, and make him more diverse and less binary.

... Blitz fans HATED it.... The love their Free-lo, bad touch Robo. :P

{{champion:157}} I usually don't take this game that seriously, but this guy... This is the ONLY (Okay, maybe {{champion:238}} as well) champion in the game that legitimately makes me feel angry. I am VERY sure that playing against these guys is bad for my health

It used to be {{champion:101}} , but then I played him and had to give props to the people who can pull him off. Takes some skill.

However, now I find {{champion:105}} disgustingly easy to play, with his zhonia's every 3 seconds, to his insane burst, to that ult that just gives you a few seconds to say, "Hey, dude. Um... you know you're fucked, right?" "Yeah." "Ok, just letting you know." *nom*

{{champion:53}} Is probably most hated champion, although there are champions I might have more disdain for no other champion in the game single handily makes a role or position in the game undoable, Blitz is basically the entire reason why I can not manage being a botlaner and for that he has earned the #1 spot on my hate list.

Honorable mentions to Yasuo with his near infinite dashes & Teemo for making for making  all my AA reliant toplaners cry.

Lee Sin
Tahm Kench
CertainlyT
Yasuo, who I barely hate more than Vayne.

{{champion:7}} 
✔ nearly no counterplay (she sees you 1000 range away you are already dead)
✔ you can't catch her
✔ feast or famine
✔ really only has one job (that is, to kill), therefore making her not so useful especially when behind
✔ terrible playerbase
✔ even worse fanbase (since they are mostly thirsty kids anyways)

If anyone is going to main her please don't breathe in front of me anymore.

{{champion:76}} is second place only because she is not completely useless, like Fizz who can build both AP and AD, and she can even heal allies!

{{champion:1}} support

Burst you for half health or zone you out just by carrying the stun charge and threatening.

{{champion:67}} 

Both playing with, and against. 

If I Support her, be it Taric or Karma for example, I'll try to stun or root the opponent. But no, she's not having any of that cause she'll just push them away and take with them any sort of help I would have been. And it's never a push towards a wall, always just a push away from me. Nothing pisses me off more than when that happens. But at the end of the day I have no one to blame but me for playing with one...

Playing against one is just as bad. I'm somehow always next to a wall and she'll push me into one, stun me, and proceed to kill me. Every. Single. Time.

"Purge with silver." No, STFU!

{{champion:157}}.   Forever.  No champ makes me hate him more than this weeaboo garbage.  His early game is NOT weak, he scales insanely hard into late, he's got an overloaded kit of doom, and he attracts the worst kind of players.  He can die 5 times in lane and still be a terror unless your team wins fast, and Wind Wall is broken as hell.  I have negative respect for Yasuo players... and unless he gets reworked, I always will.  Even when he's not overpowered, he sucks the fun out of the game.  I would utterly delete him from the game if I could.

{{champion:131}} 
She always get fed
She always gets really tanky
She does a fuckton of damage

Not asking for nerfs or anything like that, shes probably pretty balanced in the eyes of most, but that's just my experience
I think she's the strongest AP champ in the game right now, Brand close behind her after the AP item changes.
I actually hate fighting {{champion:34}} if the player is good. She has a really high skill cap that I never want to fight against.
r+e

Alright... Where do i start? I may not like many champions, but i have a special kind of hatred against {{champion:64}} this bald headed asshole when played perfectly can completely shit on people. Yes, i mean shit on people...we all had that one kind of feeling when fighting against a skillfull lee sin, who pulls of ganks every  seconds, while abusing his overloaded kit to fullest potential. I hate this guy. he dominated the jungle for 3 seasons in a row and forced so many other junglers out of the meta just because they couldn't stand up to his counterjungling antics for the first 20 minutes. When played decently this guy is basically a free win and has so many qualities. Tanky **CHECK** Mobile **CHECK** Manaless **CHECK**.  Has all the perks of a jungler, bruiser, support, assassin while having low skill floor to excecute at a basic level.

{{champion:76}} Without a doubt most frustrating champion Riot has ever made. Who thought giving one of the safest poking champions a manaless gapcloser which can be used to bounce over walls and escape was a great idea? I mean this champion has to be the most unfun champion to play against. You know... dodge the spear, you can dodge all the spears in the world and  miss that crucial max range one which chunks you for 99% of your health. During my playtime of 1 and a half years i've seen 3 times when nida was the meta pick broken overpowered pick or ban cancer. 

1.Early Season 4 the Q-bot {{champion:76}} one shotting squishies with spear easier to hit than {{champion:25}} 's dark binding
2.Mid to late Season 4 the ad top lane bully bruiser {{champion:76}}. Completely shit on your melee top laner while falling off harder than{{champion:80}} post 20 minutes.
3. Early Season 5. The Jungle {{champion:76}} . the most recent incarnation of her. Gameplay involves warding bushes and river as far as you can. Cause she can chunk a max range spear with almost no fear of her opponent to juke it out

{{champion:150}} No i don't care he's not cute. Quit forcing me into idea of liking him just because he is a prehistoric yordle. Lane bully with great utility at teamfights. While he's not really the biggest meta pick at the moment i always disliked this guy. While being overloaded with tons of free stats and utility he creates a real frustrating to play against gameplay against in lane with dodging the boomerang. Which gives 50% cooldown reduction when caught and has no freaking mana. While he is easy to counter with some picks, i despise his utility and being useful even when behind. Oh and i hate his grunts when he throws his boomering or uses all of his other abilities.

It's a Tie for me. {{champion:53}}  Because he just hits his speed buff and zones you off your minions all of lane phase. And everyone's favorite {{champion:105}} And 90% of his fucking player base since they're all arrogant and cocky. You killed him? "Nice bs champ you got there" You got killed? "ez get good" Or my favorite "Rekt"

Edit I still play blitz though ><

As support: Ezreal. I hate supporting Ezreal to the point of dodging queue if I have to support him. 

As everywhere: fuck Fizz.
Do you have some fundamental issues with Ezreal or do you just have a really terribly history of supporting/playing with the champion?

> [{quoted}](name=Ackelope,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Tj6eqz2N,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-10-28T05:46:12.415+0000)
>
> Do you have some fundamental issues with Ezreal or do you just have a really terribly history of supporting/playing with the champion?

I've supported enough truly terrible Ezreals to hate him.  In low elo Ezreal is the adc you play if you didn't get mid and don't know what AAs are. On the flipside I have supported a diamon smurf Ez who was incredible...but my experience with Ez is it's super frustrating laning with him.

{{champion:114}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:157}} 
I hate these three so much that if they were removed tomorrow I'd get drunk and celebrate

{{champion:67}}  because when ever someone plays her i can destroy her in lane but she could get a penta kill like 10 min later, she is just annoying, she doesn't do anything else but aa and roll, and she isn't fun i don't understand why people play her.

I loathe, hate, despise, (Hold on using a thesaurus), detest, and resent {{champion:74}} . All he literally has to do is place down turrets and just hide behind them while you cannot get to him without taking half your health from turrets. 

And the fact that his turrets still work without him being near makes killing him and living almost impossible (I might be exaggerating).  

Not to mention that his long range on his abilities makes it hard to get close while when you do get close his turrets just kill you while he runs away

{{champion:238}} , {{champion:105}} , {{champion:7}} , {{champion:245}} , {{champion:64}} 

Basically any assassin with an easy escape from a fight.

{{champion:7}} LeBlanc, LeB!tch, LeBullsh!t, LeBroken, whatever you want to call her. I hate her. Her damage makes your laning phase miserable, especially with her targeted spells, and it's very hard to retaliate since she just blinks back to where she was. If she gets snowballing, there's nothing you can do to stop her. 

Also, why the hell does she even have hard CC? She has 2 dashes and 2 blinks, so why the hell does she have a SNARE too? And to top it off, it's a LONG RANGED snare. LeBlanc is like Ahri on steroids. At least they nerfed Ahri's damage so she's more of a DPS kite mage, LeBlanc just assassinates you from range, or dashes over 1000 range down the lane and snares you with a long range chain and then her team catches you. Everywhere except in the middle of your teammates is out of position against LeBlanc.

Oh, and if she didn't have enough escapes already, her passive makes it even harder to kill her.

{{champion:157}} either feeds or gets fed and his passive makes me sick 
{{champion:62}} I hate him and his invisible burst 
{{champion:92}} need I say anything ? 
{{champion:126}} too much burst AoE and mobility
{{champion:150}} 3 hit pasive ranged AA with CC spamming tank mode with mobility
{{champion:245}}  overloaded kit, he just has too much stuff

For me personally it's {{champion:157}}. I just think his kit is exetremely overloaded and considering how much damage he does his kit allows him to do too much; rapidly dash through the lane, block all projectiles, YADAYADAYADA you don't want to hear all this since you can talk to anyone else and get the same complaints. But yeah, I hate even playing as Yasuo.

I used to also hate {{champion:92}} but if they bring back her rework with the edge resource and ult no longer being an excecute I think I'll stop hating her since that actually seems pretty fair. Heck, I might even play her a little.
{{champion:35}}
Fizz -.- Fuck that champion

{{champion:268}} way too much poke and consistent damage, and burst, and peel. he's just too strong in the hands of someone that knows how to play him

{{champion:31}} too high ap ratios, glad he left mid lane

{{champion:245}} guilty of playing him, but his ult is just annoying to play against. it's a legit get out of jail free card

{{champion:86}} i don't like tanky champs that do respectable damage by just walking into you 

{{champion:429}} try playing an immobile melee fighter, it's legit stupid 

{{champion:90}} pushes lanes way too fast and just annoying to deal with

{{champion:92}} all the ones on my team sucks, ones on enemy team are god like

yeah i don't hate the usual champs, lol. if you play them and know how they work they're not like you think.
Gameplay and Balance
{{champion:245}} With a burning hatred >:O
